TopicTitle: Make a wish... and have it horribly corrupted!

Articles.Content:
Granted, you get a million funds and now mort is happy! 

I wish that I could download 1.1 today.

Granted.

I wish that the Navball wasn't so large.

Granted. Now its too small. At least, thats what she said.

 

I wish i could figure out if Tom Hardy is over rated or not.

Who's that? Is he one of those 'celebrities' people keep telling me about?

I wish major astronomical events were considered national holidays.

Granted, when a giant death asteroid comes at earth, everyone gets a day off and no one does anything. Earth go boom. 

I wish that my iPad battery would stop running out so fast.

Granted, but it is the only electronic device in your house capable of running.

 

I wish more people would care about space exploration, we need to return to Luna and get to dang Mars!

Granted, but they don't go anywhere except Dres (Ceres is renamed Dres after the overthrow of the worlds' governments)

plz don't hate on me Dres-lovers, I have nothing against your appreciation for the lonely space potato! I'm only saying it would be awful to only go to one world when there are many others to explore and learn from.

I wish for Eeloo to have rings.

Granted, everyone loves it, but Dres is still better. 

And I won't hate on you @cubinator. 

I wish that someone would make a kommunity Jool 5 ship. Like the Kommunity space station, but Jool 5.

Granted, but people try to add way too much stuff and when the ship tries to do the transfer burn it wobbles out of control and explodes.

I wish for a weather balloon.

Granted, but it's on Venus.

I wish I could work at NASA.

Granted, you're the Janitor.

I wish that I could think of a wish, because with 1.1 out and all my mods so far appearing to successfully run I have no more wishes!

Granted, go to your new job at KASA!!! 

I wish there were no Dres haters.

Just now, DolphinDude3 said:

Granted, you're the Janitor.

I was just going to say that! You ninja'd me!

1 minute ago, max_creative said:

I wish there were no Dres haters.

Granted. There is no Dres now, either. It got removed from the game.

NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!!!!!!!! 

At least there's still spud, it's moon.
I wish there was a wish left for me to corrupt

Granted, corrupt this one! 

I wish that one @EliasDanger corrupts this wish.

Granted. Oh, wait!

I wish for it to be sunny this weekend.

Granted, you get roasted on mercury. 

I wish people would let @EliasDanger to corrupt this wish this time.

Gran--oh, did I corrupt your wish AGAIN? That's just sad. Would you like a Dres cookie?

I wish to be transported to the alternate universe where nothing is different except the seventh planet from the sun is called George.

Granted, but George turns out to be an illusion created by Neptune and Jupiter.

 

I wish my wife and I could land on the Moon. (It's our personal dream for the future...)

Granted, but you touch down for 2 seconds before going back up.

 

 

I wish the spider in my room was dead.

Edited April 21, 2016 by Spaceception

Granted. The spider is killed by the scorpion. 

I wish I could fly a plane.

Granted, go fly an aeris 3A. 

I wish I had good internet connection where I am.

Granted. You have successfully escaped Comcast. There is nothing corruptable about escaping comcast.

 

I wish humans leave the Solar System in my lifetime.

Not granted. Maybe. 

I wish the Kommunity Jool ship works.
